name: Jet Bomber
description:
This is another Univesity project. A short game that was adapted to play on the PC keyboard, it was made to be played using an Arduino custom controller.

The Planet Earth needs you! And alien invasion has ocurred and laser beams are causing massive destruction in the city, it seems like now they've gone to the industrial area and settled down. It's the right time to attack them with the new super soldier named Jet Bomber.

CONTROLS --  WS or Arrow Keys: move up and down Space, Enter or Left Mouse Click: shoot

Game Designer: Andrei Souza

Programmers: Anderson Milioli and Andrei Souza

2D Artist: Andrei Souza

The game can have bugs. Please report them in the comment section!
